title: Storyboards and Magic Movie features now available with iMovie 3.0 update
content:
After teasing new features coming to iMovie in the near future during the “Peek Performance” event, Apple is now releasing them today. According to a press release, Storyboards and Magic Movie functions are now available with the latest iMovie update.

more…

The post Storyboards and Magic Movie features now available with iMovie 3.0 update appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Storyboards and Magic Movie functions are now available with the latest iMovie 3.0 update for iPhone and iPad users.
